member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DotvvmEnforceClientFormatAttribute
member.summary: Checks whether the value matches the format specified by DotVVM control (e.g. TextBox). The value can be empty string or null. If it is not, it must match the FormatString that the control specifies.
